entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • background-image: url(@var) - The initial value of var cannot be empty. #17838
  • [Windows] CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not working #17836
  • [Windows] CollectionView with RemainingItemsThreshold does not scroll #17835
  • Regression: AppThemeBinding and VisualStates results in "An item with the same key has already been added" #17832
    .NET 8 GA
  • IndicatorView not visible on iOS #17831
  • [Windows] New CarouselView item doesn't render unless Window is resized #17830
  • [Windows] Resizing window causes CarouselView glitches #17829
  • Maui - some nugets do not work as path is too long "Could not find a part of the path" #17828
  • Packaged application without msix #17827
  • EmbeddedReferenceJar has no equivalent in MAUI #17826
  • Android app crashes when dragging into CollectionView #17823
  • `Border` breaks Xaml Live Preview #17822
  • Issue when Publish a Mac Catalyst app for distribution outside the Mac App Store #17820
  • Hiding keyboard prevents button command from firing #17819
  • Another Text Color issue #17818
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] CarouselView content renders behind tab bar #17817
  • .Net Maui using VS 2022 Community Edition #17816
  • TranslateTo Animation is not working on tablet #17815

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [MAUI] The App crashes after pulling up and then pulling down the RefreshView C6 page #17391
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Crash in production: .NET ThreadPool Worker EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS #17626
  • Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes #17776
    .NET 8 GA
  • IsTextPredictionEnabled does not work on Windows and always presents suggestions #17834
  • [Android] Removing a CarouselView item crashes app #17809
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Disapearing controls in CollectionView on scrolling (on Android) #17508
  • [regression/7.0.0] [Android] Entry return type not rendering properly #17463
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Project is not compatible with net8.0 (.NETCoreApp,Version=v8.0) #17791
  • SwipeView inaccessible for screenreader users on Android #6648
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update aspnet packages #17837
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • [Android] Fix ReturnType on Entry #17546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Enforce CA1805 across Core #17786
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.0 #17794
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Bump iOS version #17807
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17814
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 SR1
  • API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #17732
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
